SEO.title: Povr-Eshka — delicious recipes for every day
SEO.description: Povr-Eshka is a website with simple and tasty recipes for every day. Breakfasts, lunches, dinners, desserts, and drinks — cook with pleasure!
SEO.keywords: recipes, cooking, home cooking, homemade food, step-by-step recipes, Povr-Eshka

SEO.title: Povr-Eshka — recipes with step-by-step photos and videos
SEO.description: On Povr-Eshka you’ll find the best recipes with step-by-step photos, clear instructions, and useful tips. Cook at home with love and flavor!
SEO.keywords: recipes, step-by-step recipes, cooking, food, dinner, lunch, breakfast, Povr-Eshka

og.title: Povr-Eshka — cooking recipes with photos and videos
og.description: Cook with love! The best recipes for homemade dishes, sweets, drinks, and snacks on Povr-Eshka.

twitter.title: Povr-Eshka — cooking delicious meals every day!
twitter.description: Step-by-step recipes, cooking tips, and meal ideas for every day. Cook with ease with Povr-Eshka!

Services.title: Recipe categories
Services.serviceDesc1: Light and hearty meals for a perfect start of the day
Services.serviceDesc5: Homemade compotes, lemonades, and warming teas
Services.serviceDesc6: Ideas for holidays and quick bites
Services.serviceDesc7: Detailed instructions with photos and videos

WorkWithUs.title: Submit your recipes
WorkWithUs.text: Want to share your favorite recipe? Send it to us — and thousands of users will see it!

Clients.title: Readers’ reviews
Clients.clientDesc1: I really love your site! Everything is clear, simple, and always turns out delicious.
Clients.clientDesc2: I cook your recipes almost every day — my family is thrilled!
Clients.clientDesc3: Great site, I especially like the video recipes — it’s become easier to cook.
Clients.clientDesc4: Your recipes save me when I don't know what to cook for dinner.
Clients.clientDesc5: The search is very convenient, and the ingredients are always simple — no need to hunt for rare stuff.
Clients.clientDesc6: Now I cook more often and with joy. Thank you for the inspiration!
